On the 30th anniversary of Ronald Reagan 's inaugural, National Review Online spoke with Mike Pence about the Gipper, asking what his legacy means to him and the GOP. Ronald Reagan is the reason I'm a Republican, Mike Pence tells us.`` I was active in local Democratic politics when I was a teenager in Columbus, Indiana. He sits down and swiftly asks me a question: Have you read the book? What was your reaction?
